dates.heading: Yellowstone Caldera
dates.copy: Lava Creek Tuff, Wyoming - This supervolcano erupted 640,000 years ago.

dates.heading: Cerro Galan Caldera
dates.copy: Catamarka Province, Argentina - This supervolcano erupted 2.5 million years ago

dates.heading: Lake Toba Caldera
dates.copy: Sumatra, Indonesia - This supervolcano erupted 74,000 years ago.

dates.heading: Lake Taupo Caldera
dates.copy: Lake Taupo, New Zealand - This supervolcano erupted 26,500 years ago.
